summary: This package contains new mesh(es) to replace the default/boxy feet on females with something more resembling real feet w/toes...
descriptionHtml:
[u]FemFeet - Female Foot Replacement Mod - by Phygit[/u]

[u]Details:[/u]
This package contains new mesh(es) to replace the default/boxy feet on females with something more resembling real feet w/toes.

The feet are (mesh) compatible with the default female body - as well as the CBBE mod body(s). However the default female textures (and current CBBE textures) are not compatible - check back for links to compatible textures as they become available.

[some quick-n-dirty "sample" textures for the default mesh are included (now based on Thepal's NUDE FEMALE textures) - see the Notes section below for details]

[u]Release notes:[/u]
- v3.0
There was an issue making it difficult for texture-creators to hide the UV-seam between the feet -> shin (as well as other seams). I am always hesitant to make new UV-mapping changes, but I felt like it was worth one final change...

********************************************************************************************************************************************************
NOTE: The uv-mapping has changed with this version (for the last time)...textures designed for the v2.0+ feet will need to be adjusted.
********************************************************************************************************************************************************

...with that out of the way, I decided that since the UVs were changing anyway, I'd go ahead and make a few other adjustments...

+ UV-mapping seam between the feet -> shins can now be easily hidden.
+ UV-mapping seam that runs down the inside of the foot/ankle can also now be easily hidden.
+ Adjusted the UV-mapping seam between the sole and upper foot (the one that splits every toe) so that it's lower on the foot/toes... it's still difficult to hide that seam without a 3D Paint program, but it's less obvious now.
+ Moved a polygon-row of the toenail underside UV-mapping to the top-side.
+ Split the underside toenail mapping from the top-side and enlarged and straightened the nail mapping.
+ The 'heavy' (_1) foot shape was tweeked somewhat.
+ "Wedding Dress" sandals were added to this release (NOTE: there is a known issue when your character is set to something between Light and Heavy weight settings (the bottom of the sandals get scrambled). I will try to fix this in a future (mesh/.nif only) update).


- v2.2
"Falmer Boots" mesh replacement now included.


- v2.1
Fixes a slight foot->shin gap with the "heavy" setting (femalefeet_1.nif is only file that changed) - no changes to v2.0+ uv-mapping.


- v2.0
watshisface pointed out that I failed to account for the Khajit / Argonian "tail" mapping (the feet uv-mapping spilled over top of the tail uv-mapping).
So...

********************************************************************************************************************************************************
NOTE: The uv-mapping has changed with this version (hopefully for the last time)...textures designed for the v1.0 feet will (likely) need to be adjusted.
********************************************************************************************************************************************************

..I also made the big-toe a bit slimmer.

- v1.0
First release


[u]Compatible Texture Mods:[/u]
Calientes Female Body Mod Big Bottom Edition -CBBE- by Caliente - http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2666 (may need to be updated to use v3.0+ uv-mapping).

-CBBE- with Female feet Textures by aknot - http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3685 (may need to be updated to use v3.0+ uv-mapping).

- Skeuomorph CBBE Slim V2 Nethers by Skeuomorph - http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4254 (may need to be updated to use v3.0+ uv-mapping).

- Athletic Nude Women - CBBE by Valstein0 - http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=563 (includes a v2.x copy of my foot mod, with v2.x compatible textures for both CBBE and default bodies... don't install my v3.0 feet unless you alter the textures to match).

- XCE - Xenius Character Enhancement by Xenius - http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2356 (includes [u]v3.0+ uv-mapped feet[/u] (yay!) from my mod, along with textures for default and/or CBBE models).


[u]Contents:[/u]
These are the replacement mesh files for the character feet...
Datameshesactorscharactercharacter assetsfemalefeet_0.nif
Datameshesactorscharactercharacter assetsfemalefeet_1.nif

Falmer Boots foot replacement (will use whatever textures you already have installed)...
Datameshesarmorfalmerfalmerbootsf_0.nif
Datameshesarmorfalmerfalmerbootsf_1.nif

Wedding Dress Sandals replacement...
Datameshesclothesweddingdresssandalsf_0.nif
Datameshesclothesweddingdresssandalsf_1.nif

These are some "sample" textures...
Datatexturesactorscharacterfemalefemalebody_1.dds
Datatexturesactorscharacterfemalefemalebody_1_msn.dds

Available as a _separate_ download are some modder-resource files (all are 4096x4096)...
femalebody_1.psd - a layered .psd file of the above, that includes the uv-template for the new feet.
femalebody_1_msn.psd - a layered .psd file used to create the normal map.
leg_foot_seam_fix_4k.psd - a layered .psd file that shows a 2D painting method for fixing seams.


[u]Installation:[/u]
As mentioned above, these new feet will require updated (full body) textures, which means you'll need to check back to see if your favorite body textures have been updated to be compatible with this mod. If you want to use the "sample" (crappy) textures in the meantime, simply copy the (entire) Data folder to your ..SteamSteamAppscommonskyrim folder, so that you end up with:

..SteamSteamAppscommonskyrimDatameshesactorscharactercharacter assetsfemalefeet_0.nif
..SteamSteamAppscommonskyrimDatameshesactorscharactercharacter assetsfemalefeet_1.nif
..SteamSteamAppscommonskyrimDatameshesarmorfalmerfalmerbootsf_0.nif
..SteamSteamAppscommonskyrimDatameshesarmorfalmerfalmerbootsf_1.nif
..SteamSteamAppscommonskyrimDatameshesclothesweddingdresssandalsf_0.nif
..SteamSteamAppscommonskyrimDatameshesclothesweddingdresssandalsf_1.nif

..SteamSteamAppscommonskyrimDatatexturesactorscharacterfemalefemalebody_1.dds
..SteamSteamAppscommonskyrimDatatexturesactorscharacterfemalefemalebody_1_msn.dds

...if you already have compatible textures (or can keep your shoes on until you get some), you should only copy the Datameshes folder to your ..SteamSteamAppscommonskyrimData folder


[u]Uninstallation:[/u]
Delete the *.nif files listed above, from the locations mentioned above (you'll also need to delete or swap out your textures).


[u]Notes:[/u]
- As mentioned above, the sample textures are just that - a stand-in/sample/place-holder (don't bother telling me any issues with the textures)
- An optional download contains a layered .pdf file that was used to mix together the sample normal map and also includes a uv-template.

...a recommendation for anyone doing textures... try not to add any 'shadowing' in your textures (like between the toes) the normal map
and game lighting should take care of that and it'll be less trouble to deal with any potential uv-mapping changes and/or morphing ('skin wrinkle'
type details should be fine). The same goes for the skin 'under' the toenails... while the current normal map has shading for the cuticle area,
if someone flattens that out and moves the nails (turns them into claws, protruding from the ends of the toes), your texture will still work if
you didn't add 'toenail' details there.

[u]FAQ:[/u]
Q: Will these feet work for males?
A: No.

Q: Any plans for male feet?
A: I'll investigate that when I have time. Meanwhile, you are welcome to use the extracted mesh files as a basis for a male-foot mod (hopefully keeping the uv-mapping the same).

Q: Any plans for Khajit / Argonian feet w/claws?
A: The problem for non-human characters is... currently (unless/until someone figures it out or it's possible once the CK comes out), the game only/always uses a single foot mesh for all races. In other words, if the feet had claws, ALL of your female characters (and shoeless female NPCs) would have clawed feet.

Q: Is this mod compatible with ~insert-my-favorite-texture-mod-here~ ?
A: As stated at the top of this description, it is _mesh_ compatible with the default and/or (current) CBBE figures, but the textures are _not_ compatible, until/unless adjustments are made to those textures (either by the original artist or others).

Q: Will these feet show up in various open-toed-armor/sandals?
A: Not until/unless someone comes out with a mod for those models that uses this mesh.

Q: Are these feet compatible with the TnT_BodyShop mod?
A: A version of these feet are (now) included with that mod, but they decided not to use my uv-mapping, so you'll have to use textures designed for that mod (the body may also use different-than-standard uv-mapping, so you likely need textures designed for that body anyway). The point is... if you're using that mod, you should use the feet/textures that come with it (or that are made for it).


[u]Credits:[/u]
Modeling / uv-mapping: Phygit
Texture Base: The latest version now includes textures based on "NUDE FEMALES" resource files by Thepal (http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=70)
Conversion to .nif: XunAmarox, Caliente, 2pac4eva7, Phygit (depending on versions...)
Assistance/testing: 2pac4eva7, Thor925
Compatible Textures: Anyone who makes them.
author: Phygit
